products.title: Calcutta Stripe Blue Mist Roman Blind
products.description: Theres a wonderfully earthy, natural tone to the colours in this subtly stunning blind, the colours of a babbling brook bringing a sense of calm to a space. products.title: Calcutta Stripe Olive Roman Blind
products.description: For a warm mediterranean glow of rich, cosy colours all year round, you cant go wrong with the calcutta stripe olive roman blind. The expert layering of colours is simply sublime, vivid hues alternating with tonal shades and neutrals for a look thats bold but balanced.
